questions.title: Is embedding videos in a ZeroNet site really as simple as using a video tag or linking to a video in a relative path?
questions.body: I tested out an embed of Big Buck Bunny. The video was in the same directory as index.html. For me, it worked, but I was wondering if this would work for everyone if I published such a site. Do ZeroNet sites handle big files as transparently as creating a clearnet site?
